channel.title: How do i change the Cost of Stuff in shops ? I Know it sounds simple look
channel.description:
Hello i just wanna Know how to change them because ive got it in Dungeneering Tokens and idk how to change from 100 to 1000
where do i change it someone please help it isnt working out for me :(

item.title: How do i change the Cost of Stuff in shops ? I Know it sounds simple look
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Yeah, you should use the Search feature Google first. They might not be in there under that name.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the Cost of Stuff in shops ? I Know it sounds simple look
item.dc:creator: @thekingpin thekingpin
item.description:
@thekingpin wrote:

go into source/data/cfg/item

then search the item ur looking for
then go along, and see where it says 100, change that to 1000 or whatever, that works for coins, i dunno what client u have so i t might be diffrent

btw its the first two numbers next to the name of the item, eg

item buy sell

hope this kinda helped if not then im not sure, soz

Read full topic
